Blog.post: Heres a quiz. Copy past and there u go its on ur page to .lol What does your name mean? Princess[ oh ya!] How old are you? 13 Describe yourself in 5 words. tall, fun,outgoing,lazy,smart What are your worst qualities.i can be very lazy, outspoken.. What are your best qualities. i am fun,i give good advice[sometimes] How long does it take you get get ready in the morning. it can range from 10 minutes to 45! ~SLEEP~ Do you dream at night? ya every body dreams Do you remember your dreams? almost never Describe one. cant remember any. What time do you go to bed usually? between 9:30 and 11:00 depending on my moms mood. What time do you wake up normally? 7-7:30 What time do you wake on weekends? 8:30-10 Do youfind waking late nice or annoying? annoying!!!!!!!! do you sleep with one pillow or two:2, one on the bottom and one on top ~SCHOOL~ Do you like school? sometimes Why/why not? sometimes its good because all myf riends are there and sports and stuff but its bad because of subjects i hate Whats ur fave subject? math. english. gym. Most hated subject? history Do you have a fave teacher? mr.v ,miss heslop, mr. creighton Are you a maths/science person or an english/drama person? english/math person haha ~FRIENDS~ Do you have heaps of friends? yeah i guess. lol Do you have a best friend? i have a few{2} Do you have more guy friends or more girl friends? girl but i have some guy friends to . Do you ever get annoyed at any friend? yeah! Have you ever lied to a friend? yeah! Have you ever stolen a friends boyfriend/girlfriend? no.. ~FAMILY~ Do you like your parents? yeah most of the time Ever run away from home? nope Ever thought about it? yeah Do you have any siblings? yeah If so, do you like or get annoyed with them? um....YAAAA!!!!!!!! How old are they? 8 If not, do you mind being an only child? Do you feel your parents spoil you? yeah sometimes Do you not get along with any of your family? sometimes Do you have big family get togethers ever? nope not usually ~RELATIONSHIPS~ Do you\did you ever have a boyfriend/girlfriend? yup....sorta If so, are\were you in love with them? nope! Do\did they love you? don't think so How long have\were you been together?well no time we just were then we werent Most romantic thing theyve ever done for you?.... Do you have a crush? yup If so, are you in love?nope Do they know you like them? nope i dont even no if i like them yet Is it serious or playful? definetly playful How long have you liked them? um......a couple of weeks? Ever done something stupid to impress someone? yeah Have you ever experienced unrequited love? i dunno.. Do u find it romantic or hurtful? id unno.. Even know what it is? not a clue.lol ~Sex~ Ever had sex? no believe that a person shouldnt have sex before marriage? nope Believe in casual sex? not really When do you plan/when did you lose your virginity? i dont know!! Did you regret it? ...... ~Religion~ Do you have a religion? yah! Do you practice it i.e go to church? sometimes Do you believe in God? yes Jesus? yup! Satan? i dunno have to wait and see Heaven? i think so Hell? um.....? If you died tomorrow what do you beleive will happen to you? i don't no,thats why i want to die[not now when its my time]so i can see! Does death scare you? not death itselve but how u die i.e.the pain if any ~Morals~ Have you ever been drunk? nope taken drugs? nope stolen? yeah shoplifted? no tried to commit suicide? no Lied to a boyfriend or girlfriend? no gotten into a fight? yeah are you more innocent or guilty? both lol Would you date a drug addict? no!! have you ever had to look after someone who was a drug addict? no Are you racist? no way Are you discriminatory to anyone? sometimes Have you been a hypocrite in the past? i think so....? Do you have an open or closed mind to other peoples beliefs and feelings? very open ~Media~ Do you watch tons of tv? i dont think so How many times have you been to the movies in the past 6 months? soo many.. like 10? Do you listen to the radio often? no not rele Do you read the newspaper? sometimes Do you read magazines? yeah like all the time Are you a couch potato? yeah sometimes Do you use the internet too much? yeah![if i can post here almost ever day] ~Music~ Whats your fave style of music? everything Do you play an instrument? nope Do you sing? yeah , greatly i may add, jk i SUCK!!!!! Whats your fave band? EVANSESENCE Why?because they rock Have you met them before? no.. Name 3 cds that youve bought in that last year.. i dunno Why did you buy them? i didnt lol ~Sport~ Whats your fave sport?basketball/hockey Whats your fave sport to watch? hockey Do you have a fave team of any sort? toronto maple leafs Do you play a lot of sport? yep! ever won anything for sport? nope ~perosnality~ Are you funny or serious?funny Creative or not? creative Logical thinker or lateral thinker? logical Are you outgoing or shy? outgoing Are you lazy or active? both Have you ever been hyperactive? i dont think so.... Are you a naturally hyperactive person? NOOOOO!!!!!! ~Looks~ Are you happy with the way you look? mostly What would you change? umm..i dunno Do you wear makeup regularly? i used to but not any more Do you have a large wardrobe? yeah fairly large ~Money~ Do you have a job? nope Do you like it? ... Are you a saver or a spender? spender Do you work hard or slack off? both Have you ever been fired? .. In trouble at work? .... Made a major mistake? ....... Ever had money stolen from you? i think so ....maybe[ :( ] Are you always broke? yeah lol ~embarassing moments~ Ever snorted drink out your nose? haha yeah Ever giggled like an idiot? o ya all the time Ever embarassed yourself and pretedned nothing happened? oh yeah Ever tripped in front of someone you liked? yep Ever said soemthing really stupid? yeah Ever snorted while laughing? yeah! Ever fallen off a bed? yeah Ever sleepwalked? no Ever sleeptalked? yeah ~Memories~ Whats your best memory? i dont have just one.... Worst? i dont think i have one? Whats the wierdest memory you have? i dunno Do you have a good memory? tons Whats the coolest holiday you remember having? christmas! ~Thoughts~ Ever had funny thoughts and laughed and no one understood you? oh yeah Whats the first thoght that comes to your head when you hear these names? Melissa- my sis Bob- a big fat guy [i dunno...lol] Vanessa- amy's sis Alyssa- girl that used to go to gateway Jess- i dunno Brian- middleton Charlie- my daddy lol Olivia- old friend ...sorta Drew- carrey Lily- of the valley haha Anita- i dunno Whats the first thoughts that come to your head while hearing these words? cheese- yellow rubber - bouncey clothes- sweater big- tall dress- pretty jacket- warm polyester- stretch kite- fly washing- washing machine

"does it ever occur to you, when you put your trust in someone that they are going to completely break it? how many broken promises does it take for one to realize it isnt worth it? or...to stop putting trust in them? when you're a push over, and when you're a very trusting person, you're munipulated easily. some munipulated in things like..drugs..sex..etc..others, its just being human and trying to be able to give your heart and feelings to another human. is that so wrong? it shouldn't be. like other issues..why should racism be one? can people not just realize we're all people? we're all here to live and die. so it should be natural that we all get along. it should be natural to be able to trust another without worry. too bad life isnt like that." I didn't write this but holy shit did it ever effect me . I had no idea the person who wrote this felt this way. I can definetly say that i have a new appreciation of this person. Thanks for your moving words and constant support.

I'm making the biggest effort i can to come here and write once a day. BUt to do this you can't really expect everyday to be as good as the days before it.lol! Well i may not interest some people with what i write but i do hellp myself. By writing everyday, i can clear my head and better yet, this journal will never be stolen or peaked at by annoying younger siblings, though it is being viewed by thousands of people from across the world.[ Its possible!] Today is not but over yet so why rite about it already. dont worry though i promise ill have something for you tommorow[i can see it now.........lol maybe not yet]

School has ended and its summer vacation. You'd think id b happy ,not so much. This school year was really fun[but not as fun as last year THANKS KALEB!!!]. i dont no how to feel , were off to highschool, a whole new experience, a new way of life. Everything is going to be different but change is good [most of the time]i guess i just have to have fun this summer and see wat the fall brings.Gulp!! Speaking of summer, im going to nova scotia for two weeks.YAH!!!!!!SO I WONT BE HERE FOR AWHILE i dont no if ne body is even going to read this but even if they dont thats ok .but if some1 is reading this "thanks for listening to me ramble on about nothing" :]

I know i told u that i wuld b ritin here everyday but if u no me well enough ull no tht i have an extremely busy schedule. *laughs uncontrolably* ok if u new me well enough u wld no tht i am a very lazy person sometimes.well just came to tell u tht im not goin to b ritin here every day but i will do my best to rite here at leat once a week.............a month[:S]........ a year! Just kiddin ill be here more then that:].

Today i am Writing from a home that is not mine. i am writing from the home of my close friend justin mcleod. maybe i should say a little about him. Justim is a friend that i got well, i dont rele no how we became friends. he was just born and since then we have always been friends.Through thick and thin we have been together,that is until he moved away

Today like most others this week was just a boring day. NOthin special happenned just another borig day .Unfortunatly i dont have much to say either today but i said i wuld to my best to write everyday and that i will stay true to that. Last nite was rele fun and the fireworks were great{yes i enjoyed the fireworks is that so bad]well not much else to say so cya for now :]

This is a question that i have often asked myself. Imean does it rele affect me in any way shape or form . YYYYAAAAAAAAAHHHHH!!!!!!! duh, of course it does. its all about my heritage, and my life. i no u've probably heard this about 10000000000 times but rele if u dont understand the whole point of canada day its probably not going to make much sense to u will it . sure ull see the fire works and the fairs and all that CRAP, but is that rele wat canada day is about? Of course not . its about u and me and every other canadian living or dead and wat they did to help this country. i guess im just trying to say that ppl should appreciate the actual point of this holiday and not just look forward to the fireworks, activities and the day of work. thanks to every one for making canada a wonderful place to live. HAPPY 137th BIRTHDAY CANADA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1
